title: PBE Error 500 (Somethingâ€™s gone hextechnically wrong.)
body:
So I really wanna sign up for a PBE account but I keep getting "Error 500".

Yes, I've tried getting both CyberGhost and HotSpot Shield, but it still won't work. :< {{item:3070}} 

Any resolutions?

Edit: I've been reading and figured that it was under maintenance, so is there a specific time it will be done?

replies.body: The PBE Signup Site is currently down for maintenance while we investigate issues native to the website. During this time, players won't be able to sign up! As for a specific time when it would be done, I can't speculate on when, but definitely keep your eyes out on our [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates on the matter!
